verses.verse: Now it came to pass, when the wall<WH2346> was built<WH1129>, and I had set up<WH5975> the doors<WH1817>, and the porters<WH7778> and the singers<WH7891> and the Levites<WH3881> were appointed<WH6485>,

That I gave my brother<WH251> Hanani<WH2607>, and Hananiah<WH2608> the ruler<WH8269> of the palace<WH1002>, charge<WH6680> over Jerusalem<WH3389>: for he was a faithful<WH571> man<WH376>, and feared<WH3372> God<WH430> above many<WH7227>.

And I said<WH559> unto them, Let not the gates<WH8179> of Jerusalem<WH3389> be opened<WH6605> until the sun<WH8121> be hot<WH2527>; and while they stand by<WH5975>, let them shut<WH1479> the doors<WH1817>, and bar<WH270> them: and appoint<WH5975> watches<WH4931> of the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, every one<WH376> in his watch<WH4929>, and every one<WH376> to be over against his house<WH1004>.

Now the city<WH5892> was large<WH7342> <WH3027> and great<WH1419>: but the people<WH5971> were few<WH4592> therein<WH8432>, and the houses<WH1004> were not builded<WH1129>. large: Heb. broad in spaces

And my God<WH430> put<WH5414> into mine heart<WH3820> to gather together<WH6908> the nobles<WH2715>, and the rulers<WH5461>, and the people<WH5971>, that they might be reckoned by genealogy<WH3187>. And I found<WH4672> a register<WH5612> of the genealogy<WH3188> of them which came up<WH5927> at the first<WH7223>, and found<WH4672> written<WH3789> therein,

These are the children<WH1121> of the province<WH4082>, that went up<WH5927> out of the captivity<WH7628>, of those that had been carried away<WH1473>, whom Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> had carried away<WH1540>, and came again<WH7725> to Jerusalem<WH3389> and to Judah<WH3063>, every one<WH376> unto his city<WH5892>;

Who came<WH935> with Zerubbabel<WH2216>, Jeshua<WH3442>, Nehemiah<WH5166>, Azariah<WH5838>, Raamiah<WH7485>, Nahamani<WH5167>, Mordecai<WH4782>, Bilshan<WH1114>, Mispereth<WH4559>, Bigvai<WH902>, Nehum<WH5149>, Baanah<WH1196>. The number<WH4557>, I say, of the men<WH582> of the people<WH5971> of Israel<WH3478> was this; Azariah: or, Seraiah
The children<WH1121> of Parosh<WH6551>, two<WH8147> thousand<WH505> an hundred<WH3967> seventy<WH7657> and two<WH8147>.
The children<WH1121> of Shephatiah<WH8203>, three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> seventy<WH7657> and two<WH8147>.
The children<WH1121> of Arah<WH733>, six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> fifty<WH2572> and two<WH8147>.
The children<WH1121> of Pahathmoab<WH6355>, of the children<WH1121> of Jeshua<WH3442> and Joab<WH3097>, two thousand<WH505> and eight<WH8083> hundred<WH3967> and eighteen<WH8083> <WH6240>.
The children<WH1121> of Elam<WH5867>, a thousand<WH505> two hundred<WH3967> fifty<WH2572> and four<WH702>.
The children<WH1121> of Zattu<WH2240>, eight<WH8083> hundred<WH3967> forty<WH705> and five<WH2568>.
The children<WH1121> of Zaccai<WH2140>, seven<WH7651> hundred<WH3967> and threescore<WH8346>.
The children<WH1121> of Binnui<WH1131>, six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> forty<WH705> and eight<WH8083>. Binnui: or, Bani
The children<WH1121> of Bebai<WH893>, six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> twenty<WH6242> and eight<WH8083>.
The children<WH1121> of Azgad<WH5803>, two<WH8147> thousand<WH505> three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> twenty<WH6242> and two<WH8147>.
The children<WH1121> of Adonikam<WH140>, six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> threescore<WH8346> and seven<WH7651>.
The children<WH1121> of Bigvai<WH902>, two thousand<WH505> threescore<WH8346> and seven<WH7651>.
The children<WH1121> of Adin<WH5720>, six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> fifty<WH2572> and five<WH2568>.
The children<WH1121> of Ater<WH333> of Hezekiah<WH2396>, ninety<WH8673> and eight<WH8083>.
The children<WH1121> of Hashum<WH2828>, three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> twenty<WH6242> and eight<WH8083>.
The children<WH1121> of Bezai<WH1209>, three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> twenty<WH6242> and four<WH702>.
The children<WH1121> of Hariph<WH2756>, an hundred<WH3967> and twelve<WH8147> <WH6240>. Hariph: or, Jora
The children<WH1121> of Gibeon<WH1391>, ninety<WH8673> and five<WH2568>. Gibeon: or, Gibbar
The men<WH582> of Bethlehem<WH1035> and Netophah<WH5199>, an hundred<WH3967> fourscore<WH8084> and eight<WH8083>.
The men<WH582> of Anathoth<WH6068>, an hundred<WH3967> twenty<WH6242> and eight<WH8083>.
The men<WH582> of Bethazmaveth<WH1041>, forty<WH705> and two<WH8147>. Bethazmaveth: or, Azmaveth
The men<WH582> of Kirjathjearim<WH7157>, Chephirah<WH3716>, and Beeroth<WH881>, seven<WH7651> hundred<WH3967> forty<WH705> and three<WH7969>. Kirjathjearim: or, Kirjatharim
The men<WH582> of Ramah<WH7414> and Geba<WH1387>, six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> twenty<WH6242> and one<WH259>.
The men<WH582> of Michmas<WH4363>, an hundred<WH3967> and twenty<WH6242> and two<WH8147>.
The men<WH582> of Bethel<WH1008> and Ai<WH5857>, an hundred<WH3967> twenty<WH6242> and three<WH7969>.
The men<WH582> of the other<WH312> Nebo<WH5015>, fifty<WH2572> and two<WH8147>.
The children<WH1121> of the other<WH312> Elam<WH5867>, a thousand<WH505> two hundred<WH3967> fifty<WH2572> and four<WH702>.
The children<WH1121> of Harim<WH2766>, three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> and twenty<WH6242>.
The children<WH1121> of Jericho<WH3405>, three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> forty<WH705> and five<WH2568>.
The children<WH1121> of Lod<WH3850>, Hadid<WH2307>, and Ono<WH207>, seven<WH7651> hundred<WH3967> twenty<WH6242> and one<WH259>.
The children<WH1121> of Senaah<WH5570>, three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> nine<WH8672> hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970>.
The priests<WH3548>: the children<WH1121> of Jedaiah<WH3048>, of the house<WH1004> of Jeshua<WH3442>, nine<WH8672> hundred<WH3967> seventy<WH7657> and three<WH7969>.
The children<WH1121> of Immer<WH564>, a thousand<WH505> fifty<WH2572> and two<WH8147>.
The children<WH1121> of Pashur<WH6583>, a thousand<WH505> two hundred<WH3967> forty<WH705> and seven<WH7651>.
The children<WH1121> of Harim<WH2766>, a thousand<WH505> and seventeen<WH7651> <WH6240>.
The Levites<WH3881>: the children<WH1121> of Jeshua<WH3442>, of Kadmiel<WH6934>, and of the children<WH1121> of Hodevah<WH1937>, seventy<WH7657> and four<WH702>. Hodevah: or, Hodaviah or Judah
The singers<WH7891>: the children<WH1121> of Asaph<WH623>, an hundred<WH3967> forty<WH705> and eight<WH8083>.

The porters<WH7778>: the children<WH1121> of Shallum<WH7967>, the children<WH1121> of Ater<WH333>, the children<WH1121> of Talmon<WH2929>, the children<WH1121> of Akkub<WH6126>, the children<WH1121> of Hatita<WH2410>, the children<WH1121> of Shobai<WH7630>, an hundred<WH3967> thirty<WH7970> and eight<WH8083>.
The Nethinims<WH5411>: the children<WH1121> of Ziha<WH6727>, the children<WH1121> of Hashupha<WH2817>, the children<WH1121> of Tabbaoth<WH2884>,
The children<WH1121> of Keros<WH7026>, the children<WH1121> of Sia<WH5517>, the children<WH1121> of Padon<WH6303>,
The children<WH1121> of Lebana<WH3838>, the children<WH1121> of Hagaba<WH2286>, the children<WH1121> of Shalmai<WH8014>,
The children<WH1121> of Hanan<WH2605>, the children<WH1121> of Giddel<WH1435>, the children<WH1121> of Gahar<WH1515>,
The children<WH1121> of Reaiah<WH7211>, the children<WH1121> of Rezin<WH7526>, the children<WH1121> of Nekoda<WH5353>,
The children<WH1121> of Gazzam<WH1502>, the children<WH1121> of Uzza<WH5798>, the children<WH1121> of Phaseah<WH6454>,
The children<WH1121> of Besai<WH1153>, the children<WH1121> of Meunim<WH4586>, the children<WH1121> of Nephishesim<WH5300> <WH5304>,
The children<WH1121> of Bakbuk<WH1227>, the children<WH1121> of Hakupha<WH2709>, the children<WH1121> of Harhur<WH2744>,
The children<WH1121> of Bazlith<WH1213>, the children<WH1121> of Mehida<WH4240>, the children<WH1121> of Harsha<WH2797>,
The children<WH1121> of Barkos<WH1302>, the children<WH1121> of Sisera<WH5516>, the children<WH1121> of Tamah<WH8547>,
The children<WH1121> of Neziah<WH5335>, the children<WH1121> of Hatipha<WH2412>.
The children<WH1121> of Solomon's<WH8010> servants<WH5650>: the children<WH1121> of Sotai<WH5479>, the children<WH1121> of Sophereth<WH5618>, the children<WH1121> of Perida<WH6514>,
The children<WH1121> of Jaala<WH3279>, the children<WH1121> of Darkon<WH1874>, the children<WH1121> of Giddel<WH1435>,
The children<WH1121> of Shephatiah<WH8203>, the children<WH1121> of Hattil<WH2411>, the children<WH1121> of Pochereth of Zebaim<WH6380>, the children<WH1121> of Amon<WH526>. Amon: or, Ami
All the Nethinims<WH5411>, and the children<WH1121> of Solomon's<WH8010> servants<WH5650>, were three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> ninety<WH8673> and two<WH8147>.

And these were they which went up<WH5927> also from Telmelah<WH8528>, Telharesha<WH8521>, Cherub<WH3743>, Addon<WH114>, and Immer<WH564>: but they could<WH3201> not shew<WH5046> their father's<WH1> house<WH1004>, nor their seed<WH2233>, whether they were of Israel<WH3478>. seed: or, pedigree
The children<WH1121> of Delaiah<WH1806>, the children<WH1121> of Tobiah<WH2900>, the children<WH1121> of Nekoda<WH5353>, six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> forty<WH705> and two<WH8147>.

And of the priests<WH3548>: the children<WH1121> of Habaiah<WH2252>, the children<WH1121> of Koz<WH6976>, the children<WH1121> of Barzillai<WH1271>, which took<WH3947> one of the daughters<WH1323> of Barzillai<WH1271> the Gileadite<WH1569> to wife<WH802>, and was called<WH7121> after their name<WH8034>.

These sought<WH1245> their register<WH3791> among those that were reckoned by genealogy<WH3187>, but it was not found<WH4672>: therefore were they, as polluted<WH1351>, put from the priesthood<WH3550>.

And the Tirshatha<WH8660> said<WH559> unto them, that they should not eat<WH398> of the most<WH6944> holy things<WH6944>, till there stood<WH5975> up a priest<WH3548> with Urim<WH224> and Thummim<WH8550>. the Tirshatha: or, the governor
The whole congregation<WH6951> together<WH259> was forty<WH702> <WH7239> and two thousand<WH505> three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> and threescore<WH8346>,

Beside their manservants<WH5650> and their maidservants<WH519>, of whom there were seven<WH7651> thousand<WH505> three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> thirty<WH7970> and seven<WH7651>: and they had two hundred<WH3967> forty<WH705> and five<WH2568> singing men<WH7891> and singing women<WH7891>.
Their horses<WH5483>, seven<WH7651> hundred<WH3967> thirty<WH7970> and six<WH8337>: their mules<WH6505>, two hundred<WH3967> forty<WH705> and five<WH2568>:
Their camels<WH1581>, four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> thirty<WH7970> and five<WH2568>: six<WH8337> thousand<WH505> seven<WH7651> hundred<WH3967> and twenty<WH6242> asses<WH2543>.

And some of<WH7117> the chief<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1> gave<WH5414> unto the work<WH4399>. The Tirshatha<WH8660> gave<WH5414> to the treasure<WH214> a thousand<WH505> drams<WH1871> of gold<WH2091>, fifty<WH2572> basons<WH4219>, five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> and thirty<WH7970> priests'<WH3548> garments<WH3801>. some: Heb. part.

And some of the chief<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1> gave<WH5414> to the treasure<WH214> of the work<WH4399> twenty<WH8147> thousand<WH7239> drams<WH1871> of gold<WH2091>, and two thousand<WH505> and two hundred<WH3967> pound<WH4488> of silver<WH3701>.

And that which the rest<WH7611> of the people<WH5971> gave<WH5414> was twenty<WH8147> thousand<WH7239> drams<WH1871> of gold<WH2091>, and two thousand<WH505> pound<WH4488> of silver<WH3701>, and threescore<WH8346> and seven<WH7651> priests'<WH3548> garments<WH3801>.

So the priests<WH3548>, and the Levites<WH3881>, and the porters<WH7778>, and the singers<WH7891>, and some of the people<WH5971>, and the Nethinims<WH5411>, and all Israel<WH3478>, dwelt<WH3427> in their cities<WH5892>; and when the seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320> came<WH5060>, the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> were in their cities<WH5892>.
